text: satyanisedhikal tannalute manas'sukalil durabhimanam -anislamikakalatte paksapatitva durabhimanam-pularttiyappeal allahu tanre dutannum visvasikalkkum manassantiyeki. suksmata palikkanulla kalpana pulkanavare nirbandhikkukayum ceytu. atangikarikkan erram arharum atinre avakasikalum avartanne. allahu ella karyannalum nannayariyunnavanan
